#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int t,n,a,b,c;
	cin>>t;
	for(long long int i=0;i<t;i++){
	   cin>>n;
	   c=4*n; 
	   a=(c*(c-1)*(c-2))/6;
	   if(n>2){
	   b=(n*(n-1)*(n-2))/6;
	   b=4*b;
	   }
	   else
	   b=0;
	   cout<<a-b<<endl;
     }
	return 0;
}
